results.title: Urgent: Action Required - Account Security Update
results.content:
Subject: Urgent: Action Required - Account Security Update

Dear Employee,

We have detected unusual activity associated with your corporate account. To ensure the security of your account and company data, immediate verification is required.

Please click the link below to verify your identity and update your security settings:

[Link Removed - Malicious URL: http://internal-corp-security-update.example.com/verify?token=ABC123XYZ]

Failure to verify within 24 hours may result in temporary account suspension.

Thank you for your cooperation,
Internal Corp IT Security Team
security@internal.corp.co <--- Note the suspicious domain '.co' instead of '.com'
